IzmenenieUchetaNDSPriVyborePobeditelya: • Change of VAT accounting when selecting a winner
IzmenenieVidaZaprosaPoSostavuUchastnikov: • Changing the type of request according to the composition of vendors
IzmenenieOkonchaniyaRaundaPodachiPredloz: • Changing the end of the bid round
IzmeneniePravilaIzmeneniyaTsenyPriPodach: • Changing the rule for changing the price when submitting bid by vendors
IzmenenieMinimalnogoShagaIzmeneniyaTseny: • Changing the minimum price change step
IzmenenieObemaPredlozheniyaUchastnika: • Changing the scope of the vendor bid
IzmenenieVremeniAvtomaticheskogoProdleni: • Changing the time of the automatic extension of the round after filing
IzmenenieAvtomaticheskogoProdleniyaRaund: • Changing the automatic extension of the round after filing
UstanovlenoTrebovaniePodachiPredlozheniy: • Established requirement to submit bids only from verified vendors
SnyatoTrebovaniePodachiPredlozheniyTolko: • The requirement to submit bids only from verified vendors has been removed.
IzmenenDokumentDlyaProkhozhdeniyaPredkva: • Changed document for prequalification / NDA: {PreviousValue} to {CurrentValue}
ZamenaGruppyVoprosovPreviousValueNaCurre: • Replacing a group of questions: {PreviousValue} with {CurrentValue}
DobavlenyTrebovaniyaKUchastnikuIUsloviya: Added requirements for the vendor and the conditions of the request
UdalenyTrebovaniyaKUchastnikuIUsloviyamZ: Removed vendor requirements and request conditions
IzmenenyTrebovaniyaKUchastnikuIUsloviyam: Changed the requirements for the vendor and the conditions of the request
DobavlenaSpetsifikatsiyaTovarovIUslug: Added specification of goods and services
UdalenaSpetsifikatsiyaTovarovIUslug: Removed specification of goods and services
IzmenenaSpetsifikatsiyaTovarovIUslug: Changed the specification of goods and services
FieldChanged: • Changed the field in the description of the requested item: {PreviousValue} to {CurrentValue}
MaxAlternativeProposalCountChanged: • The ability to submit alternative proposals has been changed
IzmenenieOrientirovochnogoSrokaPodvedeni: • Changes in the approximate deadline for the summary of final results
AcceptanceExpired: Bid submission has ended. Check the relevance and update the submitted quotation.
ChangedProcedure: The customer has made changes to the request. Check the relevance of your bid!
FileAddedToAlternativeProposal: The vendor has added a document to the quotation (Alternative {ProposalNumber}).
FileAddedToProposal: The vendor has added a document to the quotation.
FinishRoundProcedure: The client has completed the bid round. Check the relevance and update the submitted quotation.
NdaAccepted: The application for participation in the tender has been approved, you can review the request and submit a bid.
NdaRejected: The application for participation in the tender was rejected. Reason: "{Comment}".
NdaSubmitted: The prequalification / NDA in the tender has been submitted.
NewParticipantWelcome: Welcome! Questions on request are discussed in this chat.
ParticipantBlocked: The customer has suspended your participation in the tender
ParticipantUnBlocked: The customer has resumed your participation in the tender
ProcedureCanceled: The customer canceled the request. Thanks to all participants!
ProcedureEndedBroadcast: Request completed. Thanks to all participants!
ProcedureEndedLooser: The customer has not selected you for further cooperation on the subject of the request, thank you for your participation.
ProcedureEndedWinner: Congratulations! The customer has selected you for further cooperation on the subject of the request. Details are on the Request tab.
ProcedureProlongated: The deadline for submission of proposals has been extended by {ProlongationTermInMinutes} min. in connection with the submission of the bid by the vendor.
ProcedureStagePublished: The customer announced a new request stage: {Comment}.
ProposalCanceled: The vendor has cancelled the bid.
ProposalGoDraftDueToMajorChange: Your bid has been rejected due to a request change or a new milestone being announced. Please update the bid.
RefuseNotification: A refusal to participate in the tender was recorded. The vendor may change his mind and return to bid submission.
RisePermitted: You can change the price of your bid that violates the bidding rule once.
RoundProcedure: Attention, a new bidding round has been announced! Better bid will increase your chances of winning!
UnCompleteProcedure: The customer has returned the request to the bids submission stage. Reason: "{Comment}".
ProcedureTariffChanged: The Service operator's fee for the current Request has been changed. The continued participation of Vendors in the Tenders means acceptance of the changes, in case of disagreement, the Vendor must refuse to participate in the Tender.
